create-group-info: To make it easier to follow the status of friends, you can create a group just for you. You do this by entering a group name here and then clicking 'create group'.
you-are-being-sent-to-group: You will be sent to your group in a moment..
main-tournament-explanation: By participating in the main tournament and filling in your betslip, your name will appear on the leaderboard to the right.
